title: American-style shredded beef
ingredients: ['1.5 to 2kg (4 lb) top rump roasting joint', '225ml (8 fl oz) white wine', '400g (15 oz) passata', '1 to 2 tablespoons Tabasco', '3 tablespoons crushed garlic', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped', '1 small bunch fresh coriander, chopped']
